Speaker Profile

Jason Collins

Chief Executive Officer

European Australian Business Council

Jason Collins was appointed Chief Executive Officer of the European Australian Business Council in October 2007. As CEO, Jason carries overall responsibility for the delivery of the Councilâ€™s core programmes, membership and relations with Australian and European government agencies, chambers of commerce and industry, and other non-government organisations. From 2010 to 2013 he was the inaugural Chairman of the European Business Organisations Worldwide, an association of European business organisations and chambers of commerce spanning five continents.

    Understanding the EU-Australia relationship
